title: Sarah Kendzior | Trump’s New Coronavirus Strategy Is "Live and Let Die": A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the president giving up the fight against the coronavirus to reopen the economy.

Then, he chats with journalist Sarah Kendzior about how she fears Trump will capitalize on the epidemic.
